genresAdvancedInfo.name: edinburgh metal
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Edinburgh Metal is a subgenre of heavy metal that originated in the Scottish city of Edinburgh. It is characterized by its aggressive guitar riffs, thunderous drums, and intense vocals. The sound is often dark and brooding, but with a sense of power and energy. Bands like Dog Tired, Perpetua, and Saor are some of the most well-known Edinburgh Metal acts.
